mods.abstract: Three color window card (red and burgundy on split fountain, pink to yellow) announcing Music City in the Desert with Richard Leigh, Paul Overstreet, Billy Aerts as part of the Nashville songwriters In the Round for Eisenhower and McCallum on October 12. Poster features a woodcut of cacti, a shack, and Airstream trailer.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
